item.title: [MNG-3355] CLONE -${pom.build.sourceDirectory} and ${pom.build.testSourceDirectory} no longer recognized
item.description:
The properties ${pom.build.sourceDirectory} and ${pom.build.testSourceDirectory} (and perhaps others as well) are no longer recognized in pom.xml. The following pom fragment had the desired effect of copying resources from the sourceDirectory in version 2.0.3, but doesn't work in 2.0.4:

<build>
<sourceDirectory>src</sourceDirectory>
<testSourceDirectory>src-test</testSourceDirectory>
<resources>
<resource>
<directory>${pom.build.sourceDirectory}</directory>
<includes>
<include>*/.properties</include>
</includes>
</resource>
</resources>
<testResources>
<testResource>
<directory>${pom.build.testSourceDirectory}</directory>
<includes>
<include>**/mockfiles/</include>
</includes>
</testResource>
</testResources>

The attached project will fail on a 'mvn test' under maven 2.0.4 and succeed under 2.0.3

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

this is a result of the hack put in place to resolve the MNG-1927/MNG-2124 issues as commented in the code

I've added translated paths to the context overrides for references to build directories during model interpolation, to allow expressions referencing these values to be interpolated as translated, not as raw values. Normal path translation still happens later, to catch those build directories that don't themselves contain expressions referencing other directory overrides from the context.

Translation: If the POM file is from a local build directory (not a repository), use the path-translated version of build.directory, build.outputDirectory, build.sourceDirectory and so on the first time through, rather than depending on some secondary process to manage this after the main path-translation sweep later in the project-construction process.

This has been applied to both the 2.0.x and trunk code lines.
This project has moved from Jira to GitHub Issues. This issue was migrated to apache/maven#5510.
